Producer: Thomas Gammeltoft, Benjamin Forkner, Tobey Maguire, Eric Kranzler, Mark Gill, Ed Cathell III
Production Co: Eyeworks Fine & Mellow, Millennium Films, Material, Film 360
Synopsis: A debt-ridden couple (James Franco, Kate Hudson) take the cash they found in a dead tenant's apartment, then become the quarry of the thief who originally stole it.
Title: Good People
